attributes.action: Drop in Centres for peope who need help in their lives
attributes.additional_details: Drop in Centres located in shopping centres manned 24 hours for people of any age to seek advice on how to get out of a bad situation.To be annonymous and confidential if requested and not necessarily in the area they live. To deal with every aspect of living drugs,involved in gangs bullying,arranged marriages,parents who can,t cope,sex,sex deviation,homeless,parental abuse and violence,bad relationships,education,health home economics, Recruit people who want to help.
